verses.verse: Let us <S%G5399><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, lest <S%G3379><s%> haply <S%G1860><s%>, a promise being left <S%G2641><s%> of entering <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>, any <S%G5100><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> should seem <S%G1380><s%> to have come short of it <S%G5302><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> indeed <S%G2532><s%> we have had <S%G2070><s%> good tidings preached <S%G2097><s%> unto us <S%G2509><s%>, even as also they <S%G2548><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of hearing <S%G189><s%> did <S%G5623><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> profit <S%G5623><s%> them <S%G1565><s%>, because it was not <S%G3361><s%> united <S%G4786><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> with them that heard <S%G191><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G1525><s%> who have believed <S%G4100><s%> do enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that rest <S%G2663><s%>; even as <S%G2531><s%> he hath said <S%G2046><s%>, As <S%G5613><s%> I sware <S%G3660><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%>, <S%G1487><s%> They shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>: although <S%G2543><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> were finished <S%G1096><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he hath said <S%G2046><s%> somewhere <S%G4225><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the seventh <S%G1442><s%> day on this wise <S%G3779><s%>, And <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> rested <S%G2664><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> seventh <S%G1442><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> from <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>;
and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> place again <S%G3825><s%>, <S%G1487><s%> They shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%>.

Seeing <S%G1893><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> it remaineth <S%G620><s%> that some <S%G5100><s%> should enter <S%G1525><s%> thereinto <S%G846><s%>, <S%G1519><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they to whom the good tidings were <S%G2097><s%> before <S%G4386><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> failed <S%G3756><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> in <S%G1525><s%> because of <S%G1223><s%> disobedience <S%G543><s%>,

he again <S%G3825><s%> defineth <S%G3724><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, To-day <S%G4594><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> so long <S%G5118><s%> a time <S%G5550><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> (even as <S%G2531><s%> hath been said <S%G2046><s%> before <S%G4594><s%>), To-day if <S%G1437><s%> ye shall hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Harden <S%G4645><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Joshua <S%G2424><s%> had given <S%G2664><s%> them <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2664><s%>, <S%G302><s%> he <S%G2980><s%> would not <S%G3756><s%> have spoken2980, Deuteronomy23 afterward <S%G3326><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> another <S%G243><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.
There remaineth <S%G620><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%> a sabbath rest <S%G4520><s%> for the people <S%G2992><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> that is entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> rest <S%G2663><s%> hath himself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> rested <S%G2664><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his works <S%G2041><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> did from <S%G575><s%> his <S%G846><s%>.

Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> give diligence <S%G4704><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> rest <S%G2443><s%>, that <S%G3361><s%> no man <S%G5100><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> after <S%G1722><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> example <S%G5262><s%> of disobedience <S%G543><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is living <S%G2198><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> active <S%G1756><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sharper <S%G5114><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%>, and piercing <S%G1338><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G891><s%> the dividing <S%G3311><s%> of <S%G5037><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, of both <S%G5037><s%> joints <S%G719><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> marrow <S%G3452><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> quick to discern <S%G2924><s%> the thoughts <S%G1761><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> intents <S%G1771><s%> of the heart <S%G2588><s%>.

And there <S%G2076><s%> is no <S%G3756><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%> that is not manifest <S%G852><s%> in <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G1799><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are naked <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> laid open <S%G5136><s%> before the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2254><s%> to do <S%G3056><s%>.

Having <S%G2192><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> high priest <S%G749><s%>, who hath passed through <S%G1330><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, let us hold fast <S%G2902><s%> our confession <S%G3671><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%> that <S%G1410><s%> cannot <S%G3361><s%> be touched with the feeling <S%G4834><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> one that hath been <S%G3985><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all points <S%G3956><s%> tempted3985, 3987 like <S%G2596><s%> as <S%G3665><s%> we are <S%G5565><s%>, yet without sin <S%G266><s%>.

Let us <S%G4334><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> draw <S%G4334><s%> near <S%G3326><s%> with boldness <S%G3954><s%> unto the throne <S%G2362><s%> of grace <S%G5485><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> we may receive <S%G2983><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> may find <S%G2147><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> to help <S%G996><s%> us in time of <S%G1519><s%> need <S%G2121><s%>.
